metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15878 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2019-6978.Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2019-6978. Notes:All CVE users should reference CVE-2019-6978 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-15878` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.2
libgd3 - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-4ubuntu0.2').
